author: Josh Davies
description: A banana influenced riff on a Scotch Negroni with crème de banana sweetness balanced by bitter notes and faint saltiness. Enjoy as an aperitivo or digestivo.
name: Pursuit of Happiness
recipeIngredient: 1 Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water) (optional)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large chunk of block ice)
